decision_conditions: By reason of its bulk, the proposed development would not appear subordinate or proportionate to the existing dwellinghouse, would be excessive in scale, would sit uncomfortably with the host building and surrounding properties and within the street scene which would be out of keeping with the character and appearance of the original property and would be detrimental to the visual amenities of the Kingston Hill/Coombe Hill, Strategic Area of Special Character, thereby conflicting with Policies D3 and HC1 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Demolition of existing side extensions, front porch and removal of the existing roof. Erection of two storey side and rear extensions (east and north) and single storey side extension (west) with accommodation in the roof. Erection of roof extension with 4nos front, 6nos rear and 2nos side dormers. Creation of new drop kerb for in-and-out driveway with new front boundary treatment including metal fencing and automated gates. Levelling of rear garden to create a patio. Fenestration alterations.
